item.title: Leaf Global Fintech
item.description: A virtual bank for vulnerable populations, allowing for the storage and transport of assets across borders from a mobile device (without a smartphone). Protects customersâ€™ savings through blockchain technology without exposure to volatile cryptocurrencies. Identity is linked through biometric authentication so that a refugee could lose their documentation and still access their finances.
